title: Nelson Mandela’s extraordinary life
itunes:title: Nelson Mandela’s extraordinary life
itunes:subtitle: On the centenary of Mandela’s birth, we speak to the politician and author Peter Hain about the South African leader’s remarkable achievements in the face of tremendous adversity
description:
On the centenary of Mandela’s birth, we speak to the politician and author Peter Hain about the South African leader’s remarkable achievements in the face of tremendous adversity
